Articles.Content:
Got the game about a week ago when I saw a discussion for it on another forum (Infinity: The Quest For Earth). Very fun! I'm an undergrad studying Mech and Aero Engineering, so this is right up my alley

One question: I paroozed the forums quickly and didn't find anything, but are there any sort of basic contests (i.e. ones which require no addons)? I tend to dislike mods and other addons that aren't vanilla and instead prefer to try being creative with what we're given from the get-go. Is there, say, a velocity competition?

Can't wait for updates!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

There are several posts where people have made up contests with rules like vanilla parts only. Look around, I'm sure you can find them.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
